entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • public EventArgs with internal properties #25563
  • [9.0 RC2, Windows] Windows debugger crashes often with SkiaSharp 3.0 Preview 5.4, works with Preview 4.1 #25562
  • HapticFeedback for iOS crashes on iOS 17.4 since SR2 #25560
    .NET 9 SR1
  • ImageButton dosen't scale Image correctly #25558
  • Embedded web view for blazor hybrid #25557
    Triaged
  • CollectionView Programmatic-Selection is not updated when binding the selectedItem #25551
  • Map Polygons Are Rendered Multiple Times #25547
  • An Error #25546

Closed

  • Unable to add localization for .NET MAUI app in VS Code on macOS #25260
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `maui/release/8.0.1xx-rc2.2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #25322
  • Can`t pack maui at local using public resource #25441
  • Cannot deploy a maui applikation on IOs! #25451
  • Update AOT profile on NET 9 GA branch #25403
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Hot Reload Got Error in blazor hybrid #25556
  • XCode 16/iOS 18 - Stable app now crashes almost immediately. #25229
  • Menu Bar - ContentPage.MenuBarItems doesn't render on Android? #25516
  • sign in to apple give authentication service unavailable in visual studio 2022 #25531
  • [iOS] Border`s Render was not correctly in CollectionView #23620
    Backlog
  • [Android] Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id 0x7f0900fd (com.twe.elon:id/labeled) for fragment NavigationRootManager_ElementBasedFragment{e99ccf3} (d735450b-8b7e-4e10-87d0-3b9a8251e4b3 id=0x7f0900fd)' #24774 #25113
  • [Android] Unable to find the default constructor on type Microsoft.Maui.Platform.NavigationRootManager+ElementBasedFragment #25106

PullRequests

Created

  • iOS UIImpactFeedbackGenerator should be used on iOS 17.5 and up #25561
  • [Testing] Added UITests method overrides allowing the use queries #25559
    area-testing
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    community ✨
  • Fix [Android]Text Clipping Issue in Entry with Long Strings #25554
    community ✨
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix toggle for including sample content in template #25549
    t/bug, area-templates, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly #25545
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Updated

  • Android: Opt out of edge to edge enforcement on api 35+ #25517
    platform/android 🤖, .NET 9 SR1
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Testing] Implement Pinch gestures in UITest extensions methods #25316
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [ci] Update versions sdk/runtime #25535
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25497
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] - Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility #24753
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Changing shape background color with dataTrigger #25544
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] RadioButton throws CGContextSetLineWidth - Fix #25542
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #2 #25378
    area-testing
  • Perf : ButtonContentTypeConverter now using InvariantCulture to parse… #25393
    community ✨, area-controls-button, t/perf
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed crash when calling ItemsView.ScrollTo on unloaded CollectionView #25444
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Windows] Improve AOT compatibility on Windows #25476
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Fix for picker on hidden page opens after back navigation in Android #25319
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
